tool_description: Zuka is an API that all devs or companies to access over 1300 resources about fitness
name: Zuka
title: Zuka

api_list.name: get exercices by bodyPart
api_list.description: this endpoint allow you to fetch data by given a name of a bodypart associate with them

api_list.name: get exercices by id
api_list.description: this endpoint allow you to fetch data of exercises with its id

api_list.name: get exercices by equipement
api_list.description: this endpoint will allow you to fetch data of exercices with a given name of an equipement

api_list.name: get exercices by a muscle
api_list.description: this endpoint will allow you to fetch exercises data by given a name of a muscle

api_list.name: get all muscles
api_list.description: this endpoint will allow you to fetch all muscles that are targeted while using exercises
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zuka.p.rapidapi.com/exercices/muscles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zuka.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get all target Body part
api_list.description: this endpoint will allow you to fetch all target body part that is trigger while doing exercises

api_list.name: get all exercises
api_list.description: this endpoint will allow you to fetch all existing  fitness  ressources available

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zuka.p.rapidapi.com"
        }
